thread.section_title: Life Style Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Style Sports | lifestylesports.com
thread.title: Eamonn Mccoy
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Eamonn Mccoy

author: Eamonn Mccoy
title: Eamonn Mccoy
text: Ordered a garment that was available on the website only to be called and told the next working day that there had been a 'stock error' and the garment was not available. This is not the first time this has happened to me with Lifestyle Sports - great shopping brand let down by poor stock control or bad website management. Very disappointed.
